test.name: Caso de Teste 03: Validar produto no carrinho

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: KaBuM! | Maior E-commerce de Tecnologia e Games da América Latina
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'KaBuM! | Maior E-commerce de Tecnologia e Games da América Latina'.

kw.name: Selecionar o menu Todos os Departamentos
Selecionar a categoria "Hardware" no menu Todos os Departamentos
Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
